issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Windows wheels are crashing due to AWS SDK error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15417](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15417). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Sadly we have an unexpected crash during the windows wheel
verification which needs to be investigated:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12224#issuecomment-1018910642

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15417?focusedCommentId=17481001) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12227
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12227>
